product_name: Timex Flex Tech Heart Rate Monitor Chest Strap - Small
long_description: The small replacement Timex Flex Tech heart rate monitor chest strap holds your heart rate sensor (sold separately) comfortably and securely to help you track your data for peak physical performance. Soft, adjustable and breathable strap is hand- and machine-washable. Fits chests 23 - 40 in. (58 - 102cm). Timex Flex Tech heart rate monitor chest strap only; sensor not included.
short_description: The small replacement Timex Flex Tech heart rate monitor chest strap holds your heart rate sensor (sold separately) comfortably and securely to help you track your data for peak physical performance.
